content: Following a successful government lawsuit to block the deal  Sysco Corp  the biggest U.S. food distribution company  dropped plans to merge with US Foods  its biggest rival  Sysco said on Monday.

name: Sysco Corporation
title: U.S. judge grants FTC request to stop Sysco merger with US Foods

content: Lawyers for Sysco Corp  the No. 1 U.S. food distribution company  told a judge that competition from regional rivals would prevent the company from raising prices if it is allowed to buy US Foods Inc  the market's No. 2 player.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco defends US Foods deal from FTC  judge skeptical

content: NEW YORK Food distributor Sysco Corp said on Friday that a record U.S. outbreak of avian flu would limit its supply of eggs and chickens that lay them for nine to 18 months  based on information provided to the company by its suppliers.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Exclusive: Sysco sees U.S. bird flu hurting egg supply up to 18 months

content: NEW YORK Food distributor Sysco Corp said on Friday that a record U.S. outbreak of avian flu would limit its chicken and egg supply for nine to 18 months  based on information provided to the company by its suppliers.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Exclusive: Sysco sees U.S. bird flu hurting egg supply up to 18 months

content: WASHINGTON/NEW YORK Sysco Corp  will be left with a bill of around $1 billion if the U.S. government kills its $3.5 billion merger with US Foods  regulatory filings show  underscoring the perils of doing deals that have a good chance of being blocked by antitrust regulators.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco may face about $1 billion in costs if US Foods merger dies

title: Sysco  FTC battle in court over merger  waiving sealed documents

name: Sysco Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Food distributor Sysco's profit misses as costs rise

content: In an unusual move  portions of a court fight between Sysco Corp and the Federal Trade Commission over the food distributor's bid for its largest rival may be closed to the public  including some of the opening arguments  lawyers for the two sides said in a pre-hearing conference on Friday.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco  FTC court fight over merger may occur partly in secret

content: Rivals of Sysco Corp  which is fighting to save its proposed merger with US Foods  have protested far-reaching subpoenas from the food service giant  according to court documents that also show one of the rivals seems to have dropped the issue.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Rivals resist Sysco document request in US Foods merger fight

content: A judge in the fight between the U.S. government and food giant Sysco Corp over its bid to acquire rival US Foods has ruled that the names of deal critics  who helped build the government's antitrust case  must be released on a broader basis.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Judge in Sysco-US Foods merger fight says no protection for witnesses

content: Sysco Corp  which is fighting the U.S. government in hopes of saving a $3.5 billion merger  has won a round.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco wins round on what stays secret in battle to save merger

content: Sysco Corp is accusing the U.S. government of failing to provide basic information about its witnesses in advance of a hearing that will be crucial in determining whether the food distributor can rescue its merger with rival US Foods Inc.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco  FTC battle over what stays secret in antitrust tussle

content: Sysco Corp extended an interim termination date for closing or scrapping its controversial deal to buy US Foods to May 7  the company said on Monday in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco extends interim termination date for US Foods deal

content: Sysco Corp and the U.S. government failed to agree on a date for a hearing to decide whether the No. 1 U.S. food distributor should be allowed to buy its biggest rival  according to a joint court document filed late on Wednesday.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco  FTC fail to agree on date for court fight over food mega-merger

content: The federal district court judge assigned to hear the U.S. government's antitrust fight with Sysco Corp over its proposed merger with US Foods Inc is new to the bench  but has a long record of handling high-profile litigation.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco judge is Obama appointee with slim antitrust experience

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 20 Sysco Corp is not holding settlement talks with the U.S. government to resolve a lawsuit aimed at stopping a $3.5 billion merger of the food distributor and its largest rival  a lawyer for Sysco said on Friday.
name: Sysco Corporation
title: Sysco not in talks to settle U.S. lawsuit to stop merger -lawyer

title: U.S. government sues to block Sysco takeover of US Foods

title: U.S. government sues to block Sysco-US Foods merger

content: WASHINGTON Food distributor Sysco Corp  and its biggest rival  US Foods Inc   have offered to sell a smaller competitor 11 facilities in order to convince skeptical antitrust regulators to approve their $3.5 billion merger  a source briefed on the matter told Reuters.

title: Exclusive: Sysco  US Foods offer to divest 11 facilities to win FTC deal approval
